CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 9, 1961, pg. 1 reads: "New Safety Director - James J. Dillion, formerly with the FBI, and the staffs of the United States Attorney and Allegheny County District Attorney, is sworn in as Pittsburgh Safety Director by Mayor Barr as Councilman Pat Fagan observes. Dillon promised at Monday's ceremony to conduct his office for the "welfare of all the people." - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Safety Director James Dillon standing at bench in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers
